content.rendered:
Pearl Lagoon Front, Oke Osho, Agbowa Ikosi, Epe

DESCRIPTION

Pearl Lagoon Front Estate is located in the beautiful and pacific city of Epe, within the new Lagos. The only area with the closest proximity to Ibeju Lekki and other places like Ibadan, Ijebu Ode, etc…90% of the total area is dry and surrounded by wonderful landmarks like the Lekki Free Trade Zone, Lekki seaport, Alaro City, etc.

With the presence of the Lagoon, the peace and serenity in this estate are next to none.

This beautiful estate sits at Oke Osho, Agbowa Ikosi Epe Local Government Area with Zero documentation fee, affordable land price, and instant allocation.

With further developments like the Gatehouse and fencing that will commence in this estate, this estate is sure going to be an appreciable asset.

LOCATION

Oke Osho, Agbowa Ikosi, Epe Local Government Area, off Epe Ikorodu Rd.

LANDMARK

  • Epe/Ijebu Ode Road
  • Lagos State Emergency and Security Regional Dispatch Centre
  • Deep Sea Port

PROXIMITY

  • 8 Mins Drive from Alaro City
  • 15 Mins Drive from Dangote Refinery
  • 12 Mins Drive from Lekki Free Trade Zone

TOPOGRAPHY

Pearl Lagoon Front Estate is 100% dry

DOCUMENT TITLE

Registered Survey

COORDINATES

602916.220mE,730029.054mN

ESTATE FEATURES

  • Good road network and street light
  • Strategically located in a conducive environment
  • A buy and build land
  • Instant plot allocation

PLOT SIZES AVAILABLE

450SQM

600SQM

PRICE:

  • 450SQM – N1, 350,000
  • 600SQM – N1,800,000

ALLOCATIONS

Allocations are immediate after complete payment for the plot and documentation fees.

DOCUMENTS GIVEN AFTER PURCHASE

You will get a payment receipt immediately after payment, payment notification letter, contract of sale on complete payment. A survey plan and Deed of Assignment will be issued on completion of payment for documentation and only when you have commenced development of your plot (Please note that the fencing of your plot is also recognized as development). While on installment payment you get a payment receipt and a letter of acknowledgment.
